HelpTooltip:
Calculates the velocity of the connected node using first
order distance on input. Outputs the velocity of each
vector.

Live Data In port connect to a Feature Extractor or a Data
Type node. Live Data Out port connects to a DataType,
Velocity, Record Examples and Machine Learning System
nodes.
PortTooltip: Connect a Feature Extractor or Data Type node
Connect to Data In port. Outputs a Vector3

tips: x value: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
y value: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
z value: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
